metadata.name: Ordinal BTC Cloaks #1
metadata.description:
Elon Musk: Many go woke for the btc cloak.

BTC Cloak are a 1st animated Ordinal Collection NFT. 

Instant Reveal + 0% Royalty, We are here to lets everyone experience BTC inscription. Total supply 3555, 222 will reserve by team vault for future collaboration use.

Phase 1:
BTC Cloak Launch, Private Discord Group & Collect Ordinal List.

Phase 2:
Airdrop the item use to claim your Ordinal BTC Cloak on BTC Chain during inscription. If your Item held the item = airdrop, If no item = you need to burn the Eth chain Cloaks. Inscription or not decided by holders.

Phase 3:
Reveal the true face under the cloaks. And.....
